Package Model

Class GameGraph

java.lang.Object
Model.GameGraph
public class GameGraph extends Object
The GameGraph class is responsible for creating, validating and analyzing the game map.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameGraph()
    Constructs a MapValidator object and initializes the Directed Graph using JGraphT.

  • Method Details

    • isContinentExists

      public static boolean isContinentExists(WargameMap p_gameMap, String p_continentName)
      Checking whether the continent exists in the war game map and return boolean value
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - Object of the WargameMap class consist of the details like # of continents and # of countries
      p_continentName - Continent's name that we are checking against
      Returns:
      false if there is no continent of given p_continentName in WargameMap else returns true

    • isCountryExists

      public static boolean isCountryExists(WargameMap p_gameMap, String p_countryName)
      This function checks whether there exists given country in the game map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - Game map object
      p_countryName - Name of the country that we are checking against.
      Returns:
      true if country exists in the game map or false otherwise

    • makeGraph

      public org.jgrapht.Graph<Country,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> makeGraph(WargameMap p_gameMap)
      This function will create the whole game map graph.
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - Game map object
      Returns:
      Graph object created

    • isEmptyContinentExist

      public boolean isEmptyContinentExist(WargameMap p_gameMap)
      This function checks whether are there any continents in map that do not have any country or empty in other words
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - Game map object
      Returns:
      true if there is some empty continents or false if there is no any empty continents

    • isEntireGameMapConnected

      public boolean isEntireGameMapConnected(org.jgrapht.Graph<Country,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> p_gameGraph)
      This function simple checks whether given Graph is connected or not.
      Parameters:
      p_gameGraph - Graph object
      Returns:
      true if connected or false if not connected

    • createSubMap

      public org.jgrapht.Graph<Country,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> createSubMap(org.jgrapht.Graph<Country,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> p_subMap, HashMap<String,Country> p_listOfCountriesOfContinent)
      This function creates the sub map of the single continent.
      Parameters:
      p_subMap - the submap that it is creating
      p_listOfCountriesOfContinent - the list of countries any particular continent is having
      Returns:
      sub graph created

    • isEachContinentConnected

      public boolean isEachContinentConnected(WargameMap p_gameGraph)
      This function checks whether each continent forms a valid sub map or not. Valid here means connected
      Parameters:
      p_gameGraph - Object of the game map
      Returns:
      true or false
